_meta.source: Researched from Cinque Terre National Park, Italian Tourism, cruise guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers La Spezia port and all five Cinque Terre villages

transit_routes.name: Train to Cinque Terre
transit_routes.note: Trains every 10-20 min. Day pass includes unlimited rides and hiking trails.

transit_routes.name: Ferry to Villages
transit_routes.note: Beautiful coastal approach. No stop at cliff-top Corniglia.

featured_experiences.name: Classic Cinque Terre by Train
featured_experiences.note: Get Cinque Terre Card. Visit 3-4 villages realistically. Vernazza & Manarola essential.

featured_experiences.name: Hiking Between Villages
featured_experiences.note: Trails require Cinque Terre Card. Some sections closed seasonally.

featured_experiences.name: Vernazza & Monterosso Focus
featured_experiences.note: Two villages with most amenities. Monterosso has only sandy beach.
